name: Product Prototyping Kit
description:
Creating a prototype can seem intimidating for product leaders, especially if you donâ€™t have a background in design. But making one is easier than you might think. In fact, if you can draw on a napkin, you can design a prototype. We made this Product Prototyping Kit to show you how easy (and fun) it really is.
